page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area is predominantly grassland and the main occupation is dairy farming. There are two small villages, Hassall Green & Malkins Bank. Malkins bank is centerd around the canal with a population of {140.}Hassall Green is a small village containing a council estate, a small school and a Church. The canal cuts through the South West corner of the village. Hassall Green has a population of {280.}Two features dominate the block. The{Trent and {Mersey canal}and the{M6 motorway}which cuts through the block from the North to South. There are very few ameneties in the area: a shop in Hassall Green which is geared to the demands of the canal holiday traffic. The Northern section of the block has a certain amount of arable farming. The new golf course at Malkins Bank is in the West of the block.
